name: Get The Heal
description:
Prototype made for GDKO Round 1.

Task :- Create a playable  character with unique ability.

#Controls :-

~ W, S / UP,Down Arrows :- Move Forward, Backward

~ A,D / Left,Right Arrows :- Rotate

~ Space :- Shoot

~ T :- Spawn targets

#Character Ability :- "Healing"

- On attacking target, character will heal itself based on taget's remaining health ( in this demo, character will get 30% more health of target's remained health )

- example :- Player health : 100, Target health : 100. After attack target's health : 80, player's health : 100 + 24 ( 30% of 80 ) = 124.

#Note : This prototype is not polished so Spawning and visuals might not be working as it should work in any original game. But goal of the task which is character ability is working properly. Thank You.

#Resources Used :-

Sprites Pack : Brackey's 2D Mega Pack
